6179.verse-arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
6179.verse-english: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

clauses-arabic.clause: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ

clauses-english.clause: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
